item.title: Generating docs from golang source
item.description: Generating docs from golang source Code examples are written in a way to be as short as possible which mean they do not do proper error handling and missuse panic to keep it short. It is very easy to extract comments from go source code to convert them to a different format. 3 special packages are required for this: go/ast and go/parset and go/token parser.Parsfile returns *ast.File which gives as access programatic access to various source file parts like comments, functions and fields.
